show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Dr Eugene Zampieron, ND, www.drznaturally.com interviews Christopher Vasey, ND. Dr. Vasey joins us from Chamby-Montreux, Switzerland.
He completed his naturopathic degree in Paris, and began private practice in 1979.
Since 1994 he has  written books with a spiritual approach to health and nature.
Available only in French, the books discuss the mystery of the blood, laws of nature, and elemental beings.
Dr Vasey has also authored several books published internationally, including “The Acid Alkaline Diet” , “The Water Prescription” , “The Mono Detox Cure” and “The Whey Cure”.
On todays show, Christopher discusses his latest book, The Healing Power of Fever, your Body’s Natural Defense Against Disease.
Contact: www.christophervasey.ch
